forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a veil of clouds, with hints of impending drizzle lingering in the air. The cityscape stretches out below, its iconic landmarks subtly shrouded in a marine layer that whispers secrets of the ocean. A gentle breeze dances through the streets, carrying with it the brisk scent of salt and earth, an invitation to indulge in the stillness before the day awakens fully. As the sun ascends higher, it promises to peel away the layers of gray, revealing the muted beauty of the bustling city. By afternoon, glimpses of bright blue may emerge, though the atmospheric energy hints that clouds could wrap the skyline once more.

The cool temperature suggests layers—perhaps a light jacket or a cozy sweater will serve one well as the day transitions. For those seeking a way to embrace the weather, a stroll through the nearby parks might be delightful. There, one can relish the scent of damp earth and the moments caught in quiet contemplation, or perhaps stop by a quaint café for a warm beverage while relishing the gentle hum of city life. As dusk begins to weave its tapestry, cloaking the city in softer shadows, consider meandering along the waterfront, where the mix of fog and light creates a canvas of serene beauty.
